subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Marat Safin and Fabrice Santoro lost what they insisted were their final French Open singles matches and the 16-year-old Michelle Larcher de Brito upset No. 15 seed Zheng Jie.
snippet: Marat Safin and Fabrice Santoro lost what they insisted were their final French Open singles matches and the 16-year-old Michelle Larcher de Brito upset No. 15 seed Zheng Jie.
